name: data_ingestion
description: Ingests data from various sources: files, text, APIs, databases, or URLs.

source_type.description: The type of data source to ingest.

source_path.description: File path, URL, or API endpoint. Leave empty if source_type is 'text'.

content.description: Direct text or data content. Only used when source_type is 'text'.

format_hint.description: Expected format of the data to aid parsing.
